archimate:BusinessProcess.name: SYS.5.BP5 Establish bidirectional traceability
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Establish bidirectional traceability between system requirements and test cases included in the system qualification test specification. Establish bidirectional traceability between test cases included in the system qualification test specification and system qualification test results. NOTE 2: Bidirectional traceability supports coverage, consistency and impact analysis.
